short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the best price on Amazon in Europe.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Compare product deals from European Amazon stores and find the cheapest offer!

PriceCheck.pro is a Chrome extension that helps you compare the prices of the same product over all European Amazon stores. No registration is necessary!

How does it help:
Amazon prices vary from one country to another and especially for more expensive products, their prices vary a whole lot more. If you are looking for your next phone, that flagship model at amazon.de can be cheaper than amazon.fr. 

Whilst you may have Prime on one account or the other, most of the Amazon products can be shipped all around Europe. It will just take a bit longer, but the savings have proven to be immense!

We are not only giving you a simple solution but also simplifying your shopping experience.

We currently support:
- Amazon Germany (amazon.de)
- Amazon Spain (amazon.es)
- Amazon Italy (amazon.it)
- Amazon France (amazon.fr)
